constraint.name: bpd1max1PoolInvisible
constraint.description: Only one Pool may have an invisible boundary
constraint.message: Only one Pool may have an invisible boundary

constraints.constraint: self.validate() The Expression is not valid w.r.t. the given Expression Language. Invalid Expression.

constraint.name: event1outgoingAreUnconditioned
constraint.description: Events may not have outgoing conditional Sequence Flows
constraint.message: Events may not have outgoing conditional Sequence Flows

constraint.name: eventTriggerAttributes
constraint.description: Not all Attributes that are required for the given Event Trigger are set.
constraint.message: Not all Attributes that are required for the given Event Trigger are set.

constraint.name: eventTriggerAllowed
constraint.description: The selected Event Trigger is not allowed for the current Event Type.
constraint.message: The selected Event Trigger is not allowed for the current Event Type.

constraint.name: act1IsAtomicOrEmbedded
constraint.description: Only Activities of Type Embedded may hold other Flow Objects
constraint.message: Only Activities of Type Embedded may hold other Flow Objects

constraint.name: act2TaskSingleMessage
constraint.description: Tasks must not have more than one incoming or Outgoing Message Flow
constraint.message: Tasks must not have more than one incoming or Outgoing Message Flow

constraint.name: act3CompensationNoOutgoingSeq
constraint.description: Compensation Activities must not have outgoing Sequence Flows
constraint.message: Compensation Activities must not have outgoing Sequence Flows

constraint.name: act4startQuantityNotLowerThanOne
constraint.description: An Activitiy' StartQuantity must be at least 1
constraint.message: An Activity's StartQuantity must be at least 1

constraint.name: activityType
constraint.description: Not all Attributes that are required for the given Activity Type are set.
constraint.message: Not all Attributes that are required for the given Activity Type are set.

constraint.name: proc1startAndEnd
constraint.description: When there is a Start Event there has to be an End Event and vice versa
constraint.message: When there is a Start Event there has to be an End Event and vice versa

constraint.name: proc2noPseudoStarts
constraint.description: When there is a Start Event there must not be any Flow Objects with no incoming Sequence Flow
constraint.message: When there is a Start Event there must not be any Flow Objects with no incoming Sequence Flow

constraint.name: proc3NoPseudoEnds
constraint.description: When there is an End Event there must not be any Flow Objects with no outgoing Sequence Flow
constraint.message: When there is an End Event there must not be any Flow Objects with no outgoing Sequence Flow

constraint.name: absProcAdHoc
constraint.description: If the Ad Hoc Flag is set the other Ad Hoc Attributes have to be specified, too.
constraint.message: If the Ad Hoc Flag is set the other Ad Hoc Attributes have to be specified, too.

constraint.name: gate1noMessageFlows
constraint.description: Gateways must not have incoming or outgoing Message Flows
constraint.message: Gateways must not have incoming or outgoing Message Flows

constraint.name: gate2AndNoOutgoingConditional
constraint.description: AND-Gateways must not have outgoing conditional Sequence Flows
constraint.message: AND-Gateways must not have outgoing conditional Sequence Flows

constraint.name: gate3XOREventOutgoingConditonNone
constraint.description: An XOR-Event-Gateway's outgoing Sequence Flow's Condition must be set to None
constraint.message: An XOR-Event-Gateway's outgoing Sequence Flow's Condition must be set to None

constraint.name: gate4XOREventOutgoingTargetRecMsgTimerRuleLink
constraint.description: An XOR-Event-Gateway's outgoing Sequence Flow's target must be a Receive Task or an int. Event of Type Message, Timer, Rule or Link
constraint.message: An XOR-Event-Gateway's outgoing Sequence Flow's target must be a Receive Task or an int. Event of Type Message, Timer, Rule or Link

constraint.name: gate5XOREventNotBothRecTaskAndMsgEvent
constraint.description: An XOR-Event-Gateway's outgoing Sequence Flow's target must not be both Receive Tasks and Intermediate Message Events
constraint.message: An XOR-Event-Gateway's outgoing Sequence Flow's target must not be both Receive Tasks and Intermediate Message Events

constraint.name: gate6complexInputCond
constraint.description: When a Complex Gateway has more than one incoming Sequence Flow the IncomingCondition must be given
constraint.message: When a Complex Gateway has more than one incoming Sequence Flow the IncomingCondition must be given

constraint.name: gate7complexOutgoingCond
constraint.description: When a Complex Gateway has more than one outgoing Sequence Flow the OutgoingCondition must be given
constraint.message: When a Complex Gateway has more than one outgoing Sequence Flow the OutgoingCondition must be given

constraint.name: gatewayType
constraint.description: Not all Attributes that are required for the given Gateway Type are set.
constraint.message: Not all Attributes that are required for the given Gateway Type are set.

constraint.name: start1hasOutgoingSequenceFlows
constraint.description: A Start Event must have at least one outgoing Sequence Flow
constraint.message: A Start Event must have at least one outgoing Sequence Flow

constraint.name: start2hasNoIncomingSequenceFlows
constraint.description: A Start Event must not have Incoming Sequence Flows
constraint.message: A Start Event must not have Incoming Sequence Flows

constraint.name: start3hasNoOutgoingMessageFlows
constraint.description: A Start Event must not have outgoing Message Flows
constraint.message: A Start Event must not have outgoing Message Flows

constraint.name: start4messageFlowHasMessageTrigger
constraint.description: A Start Event with incoming Message Flow must be of type Message
constraint.message: A Start Event with incoming Message Flow must be of type Message

constraint.name: intermediate1hasNoOutgoingMessageFlows
constraint.description: An Intermediate Event must not have outgoing Message Flows
constraint.message: An Intermediate Event must not have outgoing Message Flows

constraint.name: intermediate2activitySetNotNoneOrLink
constraint.description: An Intermediate Event that is attached to an activity must not be of type None or Link
constraint.message: An Intermediate Event that is attached to an activity must not be of type None or Link

constraint.name: intermediate3cancelOnTransactionOnly
constraint.description: An Intermediate Event with a Cancel trigger must be attached to a Trancsaction Activity
constraint.message: An Intermediate Event with a Cancel trigger must be attached to a Trancsaction Activity

constraint.name: intermediate4activityNoIncoming
constraint.description: An Intermediate Event bound to an Activity must not have incoming Sequence Flows
constraint.message: An Intermediate Event bound to an Activity must not have incoming Sequence Flows

constraint.name: intermediate5compensationNoOutgoing
constraint.description: An Intermediate Event of type Compensation must not have outgoing Sequence Flows.
constraint.message: An Intermediate Event of type Compensation must not have outgoing Sequence Flows.

constraint.name: intermediate6normalFlowNotCancelMultiple
constraint.description: An Intermediate Event in normal flow must not be of type Cancel or Multiple
constraint.message: An Intermediate Event in normal flow must not be of type Cancel or Multiple

constraint.name: intermediate7normalFlowNoneErrorCompOneIncoming
constraint.description: An Intermediate Event in normal flow with None, Error or Compensation trigger must have exactly one incoming Sequence Flow
constraint.message: An Intermediate Event in normal flow with None, Error or Compensation trigger must have exactly one incoming Sequence Flow

constraint.name: intermediate8incomingMaxOne
constraint.description: An Intermediate Event in normal flow must not have more than one incoming Sequence Flows
constraint.message: An Intermediate Event in normal flow must not have more than one incoming Sequence Flows

constraint.name: intermediate9oneOutgoingIfNotLinkOrComp
constraint.description: An Intermediate Event must have exactly one outgoing Sequence Flow (exceptions: Link, Compensation)
constraint.message: An Intermediate Event must have exactly one outgoing Sequence Flow (exceptions: Link, Compensation)

constraint.name: intermediate10linkOneIncomingOrOutgoing
constraint.description: An Intermediate Event of type Link must have exacly one incoming OR outgoing Sequence Flow
constraint.message: An Intermediate Event of type Link must have exacly one incoming OR outgoing Sequence Flow

constraint.name: intermediate11sourceLinkMustHaveTarget
constraint.description: An Intermediate Event of type Link (source) must have exactly one target with the same link ID
constraint.message: An Intermediate Event of type Link (source) must have exactly one target with the same link ID

constraint.name: intermediate12messageMaxOneIncomingMsg
constraint.description: Only Intermediate Events of type Message may have exactly one incoming Message Flow
constraint.message: Only Intermediate Events of type Message may have exactly one incoming Message Flow

constraint.name: intermediate13doNotUseIntLinkIfTargetInSamePool
constraint.description: When a Link Event's Target is in the same Pool then a Link End Event should be used
constraint.message: When a Link Event's Target is in the same Pool then a Link End Event should be used

constraint.name: intermediate14errorCodeInNormalFlowGiven
constraint.description: An Intermediate Error Event in normal flow must provide an ErrorCode
constraint.message: An Intermediate Error Event in normal flow must provide an ErrorCode

constraint.name: end1hasIncomingSequenceFlows
constraint.description: An End Event must have at least one incoming Sequence Flow
constraint.message: An End Event must have at least one incoming Sequence Flow

constraint.name: end2hasNoOutgoingSequenceFlows
constraint.description: An End Event must not have Outgoing Sequence Flows
constraint.message: An End Event must not have Outgoing Sequence Flows

constraint.name: end3hasNoIncomingMessageFlows
constraint.description: An End Event must not have incoming Message Flows
constraint.message: An End Event must not have incoming Message Flows

constraint.name: seq1isSameProcess
constraint.description: Sequence Flows can not cross process boundaries
constraint.message: Sequence Flows can not cross process boundaries

constraint.name: seq2notNonewhenXORorOR
constraint.description: A Sequence Flow's Condition Type may not be None if the source is a XOR Data or Inclusve OR Gateway
constraint.message: A Sequence Flow's Condition Type may not be None if the source is a XOR Data or Inclusve OR Gateway

constraint.name: seq3noSingleConditionals
constraint.description: There must be no single conditional outgoing Sequence Flows
constraint.message: There must be no single conditional outgoing Sequence Flows

constraint.name: seq4noneConditionType
constraint.description: A Sequence Flow with a source of Type XOR Event, Complex or And Gateway or Event must have the Condition Type None
constraint.message: A Sequence Flow with a source of Type XOR Event, Complex or And Gateway or Event must have the Condition Type None

constraint.name: seq5defaultAllowed
constraint.description: The Default Condition Type may be used only if the source is an Activity or a Gateway with the Sequence Flow being set as default
constraint.message: The Default Condition Type may be used only if the source is an Activity or a Gateway with the Sequence Flow being set as default

constraint.name: seq6quantityAtLeastOne
constraint.description: A Sequence Flow's Quantity may not be less than 1
constraint.message: A Sequence Flow's Quantity may not be less than 1

constraint.name: msg1notSamePool
constraint.description: Message Flows can only connect different pools
constraint.message: Message Flows can only connect different pools

constraint.name: msg2NotGatewayLaneArtifact
constraint.description: Message Flows may not connect to Lanes, Gateways or Artifacts
constraint.message: Message Flows may not connect to Lanes, Gateways or Artifacts

constraint.name: expression1isValid
constraint.description: Expressions using VXL Expression Language: Validation failed
constraint.message: Expressions using VXL Expression Language: Validation failed

category.name: VSDT BPMN Editor
category.description: Commands related to the VSDT BPMN Editor.

action.label: &Initialize Output Set
action.tooltip: Create a new Output Set from the associated Data Objects

action.label: &Initialize Input Set
action.tooltip: Create a new Input Set from the associated Data Objects

action.label: &Initialize Message
action.tooltip: Create a new Message Element for this Message Flow and its source and target

action.label: &Initialize ID
action.tooltip: Generate a new ID for this object

action.label: &Initialize all IDs
action.tooltip: Generate new IDs for all objects in the diagram

action.label: &Set Type
action.tooltip: Change the type of the selected Element
